name: MuscleX
description: Muscle-X is multi utility platform with our so called "X Platforms" Muscle-X has a PVP/P2E game called X-Fights which will go live at the launch of the project, in this game players will use the NFT characters to fight each other. Muscle-X also has a lottery platform where players will be able to buy tickets using their token which makes Muscle-X a ecosystem. Also does it offer a staking platform where investors can stake NFT's and the Muscle-X token. We have been Audited by Certik which ensures safety for our future investors.
